aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Help

  • Object
    • Help

  • public class Help
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Help.
    Local Call
    Help commands are all local.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • uiHelpAtPointer

        public void uiHelpAtPointer()
        Opens a help topic related to the object at the pointer position.

      • uiUnitDetailHelp

        public void uiUnitDetailHelp(int protoID,
                    int civID)
        Brings up the detail help UI for the given protoID. If no protoID is provided (-1), help for the selected unit is shown.

      • uiTechDetailHelp

        public void uiTechDetailHelp(int techID,
                    int civID)
        Brings up the detail help UI for the given technology node ID.

      • uiTopicDetailHelp

        public void uiTopicDetailHelp(string topicName)
        Brings up the detail help UI for the given help topic.

      • uiLastDetailHelp

        public void uiLastDetailHelp()
        Goes back to the most recent help entry.

      • help

        public void help(string commandSubstring)
        Deprecated. 
        Prints a list of all console commands that contain the given substring.

      • helpPrefix

        public void helpPrefix(string commandPrefix)
        Deprecated. 
        Prints a list of all console commands that start with the given prefix.

      • helpText

        public void helpText(string helptextSubstring)
        Prints a list of all console commands whose helptext contains the given substring.
